Name: Escape The Tank
About the game: solo project, this is the first game i have ever made and is the result of teaching myself how to use a game engine. this is a simple 3d platform game set inside a fish tank. 20 different levels to play through (+1 secret level) Explore the tank, avoid dangers, solve problems and jump around to find your way out. Pretty simple but surprisingly fun to play. this game is no triple-A blockbuster, but i am hoping this simple game might inspire others to try and learn developing as well. I intend to continually improve on this game over time. (NOTE: a rebuild of this game will be released in this place sometime in the future, however the time frame on which that will happen is uncertain. jump on this now before the price goes up with the next big update!!) thank you for your consideration :)
